dataList.content: If the enemy's attacks cannot be met head-on, going on the defensive might be the better strategy.
Sometimes, destroying a protected Part to capitalize on the enemy's weaknesses can be a sound strategy.
Check the E.G.O your Sinners have equipped and their required resources to form a team of Identities that can efficiently gather them in battle.
Identifying the Resistance values on the enemy's weak Part might be the better strategy.
It is important to identify the situations in which E.G.O Skills are most effective.
Check the E.G.O your Sinners have equipped and their required resources to form a team of Identities that can efficiently gather them in battle.
The Index Apprentice Sora gains Karmic Consequence if she fails to fulfill the Prescript. Make sure to check which Prescript she has received and prevent her from executing it.
To prevent the execution of The Index Apprentice Sora's early-phase Prescript, it is best for Sinners inflicted with "The Prescript's Target" to avoid Clashing with Sora's first Skill Slot.
Ryōshū's has a hidden, unique effect in this Encounter. If a certain attack used by the Index Apprentice is difficult to overcome, try commanding Ryōshū against her.
Examine the "Silent Regard" Skill—it provides a way to lower the enemy's Power for this turn.
Examine the "Phantom Step [殘像步]" Skill—it may have a way to mitigate the enemy's unique debuff, "Bladetrail [Afterimage]."
